Package org.simplity.rest

classes that handle open-api requests

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServiceTranslator
    interface to be used to develop an installation specific mapper/translator between Swagger defined operations, and service implementations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Operation
    specification for an operation based on Open API/swgger.
    Operations
    static class that gets swagger/openApi for a given url
    PathNode
    represents a node of the path tree we construct to map a request url/path to a service
    Response
    represents a response from a swagger (open api) document
    RestAgent
    internal servlet that handles all requests coming in as open-api.
    RestContext
    holds installation specific parameters for this Rest
    RestInboundAgent
    internal servlet that handles all requests coming in as open-api.
    Serve
    this is an example servlet to demonstrate how a project can use HttpAgent to deliver services in the App layer to http clients
    Startup
    to be configured to run as a startup servlet when Simplity application needs to be exposed as servlet
    Tags
    contains definition of all tag/attribute names used from Open API
    TestTranslator  

Package org.simplity.rest Description

classes that handle open-api requests
Author:
simplity.org
